pages.title: West African Manatee
pages.text: It is the only manatee species to be found in the Old World.$(br2)Not a great deal is known about T. senegalensis.

pages.title: West African Manatee
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:sea_grass$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
